display_long_description:
Laser Limbo is an AR battle game compilation. It transforms homes, offices, or entire floors into unique spatial multiplayer arenas that make perfect use of every square meter of space as they wrap around any obstacle.

Features:
- Small solo campaign
- PvP Shooter (Laser Tag like)
- Coop Wave Shooter
- Solo Wave Shooter
- PvP Coin Chase & Puzzle Mode (No Guns)
- 3 Player (currently limited)*
- Adjustable bullet speed
​​​- Map editor & manager
- Laser traps
- Retro pixel art style 
- UI available in 7 languages 

Short term road map
- Elaboration and polishing of the multiplayer functions
- Incorporation of player feedback

Mid term road map
- Incorporation of exclusive quest features (Shared Spatial Anchor, Room Scan etc.)
- Elaboration of the solo campaign. With new game mechanics, enemies, weapons and bosses and a storyline.

We're a small indie studio from Berlin and very happy for you feedback.
Please join our Discord channel: https://discord.gg/T46nfPXebv

* We also offer an Enterprise version that supports up to 8 players. Contact us on Discord for temporary access if you’re planning a larger game session. We are also working on a solution to accommodate more players in the near future.
